  • Method Details

    • handlePost

      public static java.lang.String handlePost​(spark.Request request, spark.Response response)
      Handle the Github post event: get info, clone run tests and return response.
      Parameters:
      request - from github
      response - to send back
      Returns:
      string "success" if all succeded "failed" otherwise

    • setCommitStatus

      public static boolean setCommitStatus​(org.json.JSONObject relevant_data, org.json.JSONObject testResults, java.lang.String state, int buildID)
      Method that sends pass and fail for the build results.
      Parameters:
      relevant_data - data with with statuses url and commit id
      testResults - the results from the tests
      state - is either "success", "buildFailed" or "testsFailed" depending on the status
      buildID - the id of the build
      Returns:
      true if setting commit status succeded

    • cloneRepository

      public static boolean cloneRepository​(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String branch, java.io.File cloneDirectoryPath)
      Clone the given repository and branch from git to the specified file
      Parameters:
      url - the url of the repository to clone
      branch - the branch to clone
      cloneDirectoryPath - the file to clone the repo to
      Returns:
      true if cloning was successful

    • tearDown

      public static void tearDown​(java.io.File file) throws java.io.IOException
      Teardown session to prepare for next execution. Close the git session Delete the cloned repo
      Parameters:
      file - the cloned repo
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if deleting directory failed
